items.sentence: Tom gave what he hoped was a disarming smile.
Do you really think that Tom will believe us?
I don't really think that Tom needs our help.
Would you ever accept a ride from a stranger?
I have to admit that I don't really like Tom.
Tom is probably about thirteen years old now.
Tom is too busy to help me do that right now.
I want to hang out with you and your friends.
Tom doesn't have to give Mary another chance.
Tom doesn't have to be the one who does that.
